question: How do I submit my own recipe?
answer: You can submit your recipe by going to the 'Add Recipe' section in the app. Fill in the required details like ingredients, steps, cook time, and upload a photo. Once reviewed, your recipe will be published.

question: Are the recipes free to access?
answer: Yes! All recipes in our app are free to browse, save, and share. Some premium features (like meal planning or ad-free experience) may require a subscription.

question: Can I save recipes to view offline?
answer: Absolutely. Just tap the Save icon on any recipe, and it will be available in your 'Saved Recipes' even without internet access.

question: How do I filter recipes by dietary preferences?
answer: Use the filter option on the home or search page to narrow recipes by dietary needs like vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, keto, or low-carb.

question: Is there a shopping list feature?
answer: Yes! When viewing any recipe, you can tap 'Add to Shopping List' and it will auto-generate a list of ingredients you need to buy.
